title: I thought it was great in Ornn's bio to let Anivia burn his house down and Volibear beat him up
body: I honestly never saw that coming. Hopefully this marks a long trend of Volibear beating up every new champ that comes to League like some sort of initiation.

replies.body:
*Kayns backstory* 

I picked up the scythe and could feel it's power! Then all of the sudden a giant bear man came out of nowhere and began to beat the shit outta me for no reason whatsoever. WHAT DOES IT MEAN
DOUBLE RAINBOW
Manbear(pig) is real!

> [{quoted}](name=Karakot,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=KoadgEOr,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2017-08-11T04:18:45.773+0000)
>
> *Kayns backstory* 
> 
> I picked up the scythe and could feel it's power! Then all of the sudden a giant bear man came out of nowhere and began to beat the shit outta me for no reason whatsoever. WHAT DOES IT MEAN

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

{{champion:203}} 

Lamb: "Its time for the reaping dear wolf"
Wolf: "Indeed but first.."
Lamb: "yes?"
Wolf: "a deranged bear ate half my body, I'm now just a floating head with no real capabilities."
Lamb: "its fine, people only like me anyway."

Its funny cause its true!
*Cries in Thematic* ;-;

"Hopefully this marks a long trend of Volibear beating up every new champ"

- I approve this message

> [{quoted}](name=1wolfpack,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=KoadgEOr,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-08-11T00:50:36.955+0000)
>
> "Hopefully this marks a long trend of Volibear beating up every new champ"
> 
> - I approve this message

As do I.
Did Zilean beat up Volibear when he first showed up though? Time travel and all that.
Zilean got Volibear beat his past self up.
Zilean is still beating up Volibear as we speak. It's been going on for a while.

> [{quoted}](name=Habbyman,realm=OCE,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=KoadgEOr,comment-id=00010000000000000000,timestamp=2017-08-11T15:50:37.936+0000)
>
> Zilean is still beating up Volibear as we speak. It's been going on for a while.

Considering it is Zilean he has probably been beating up Volibear since he was born.  Basically Voli grew up being bullied by someone for something he does in the future which thus turned Voli into a bully, which is why he beats other people up.
Oh sure, try to blame this all on Zilean! Zilean is the real victim here! >:(

> [{quoted}](name=Quort,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=KoadgEOr,comment-id=0001000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-08-11T23:54:16.575+0000)
>
> Oh sure, try to blame this all on Zilean! Zilean is the real victim here! >:(

Oh yeah no, screw Voli.  I am a Zilean supporter.  Zilean just did his job so well that he is what has caused Voli to beat up every other champion, which effectively means that Zilean has beaten up every other champion eh?

The trick isn't to ignore the truth, it is to twist it to your own devious ends to undeniably support you highly questionable claim.
#Zileandidnothingwrong
Mhm. Yes. The League roster is just lucky Zilean doesn't deem them worthy of his time. Otherwise, he'd be opening a major can of whoopass on them. :D
Bully Volibear skin when? /s
Now isn't that ironic. A phoenix, not of fire but of ice, burned someone's house down.
She did not set the fire herself
She is the one who caused the fire, however, even if she herself didn't create fire.
Oh that's why we dont see volibear on the rift anymore, he's too busy beating new champs.

> [{quoted}](name=Starcraft243ver,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=KoadgEOr,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2017-08-11T08:18:42.761+0000)
>
> Oh that's why we dont see volibear on the rift anymore, he's too busy beating new champs.

Volibear is the fictional manifestation/representation of the Riot balance team.
And they use volibear's claws instead of a needle, because all of their balance changes have rediculous splash damage.

"Eve rework has been cancelled due to her sustaining grievous wounds from injuries that appear to be bear bites. Witnesses describe hearing lighting and a woman screaming "WHY DOES IT HAVE FUCKING LIGHTING CLAWS." - Riot spokesperson.

Every time a champion is greenlit for development and the concept is being realized....

Riot Writer: "Have you met my bear Voli?"
What's your favorite aminal? A bear?

> [{quoted}](name=ChompyWulf,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=KoadgEOr,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2017-08-11T05:21:51.234+0000)
>
> Every time a champion is greenlit for development and the concept is being realized....
> 
> Riot Writer: "Have you met my bear Voli?"

Hahahah
So Frejord is actually set in an alternate universe version of Russia.
Nice try Volibear

{{champion:127}} : "I remember the day I lost my eyesight, as clear as the very ice I control."

Some Random Person : "How did it happen?"

{{champion:127}} : "Oh this random ass bear just came out of fucking no where and smacked me across the face, took out both my eyes. Thankfully it had lightning claws for some reason so it numbed the what would probably have been excruciating pain."

Really though, it's impossible considering how long ago Liss went blind, but it would be hilarious if it was somehow like an ancestor or something to Voli and that's where he gets his new champion smacking desires from.
In his ages long feud with Volibear, Zilean messed up and sent Voli way back into the ancient past, and the enraged bear attacked the first poor sucker he saw. This is how Lisandra was blinded.
Sniveling cubs

Now it is all made clear!

>Did You Know:
Garen left home to join the Dauntless Vanguard, one of Demacia's most elite military forces, when he was only twelve years old.

...Because Volibear had just beat him up.
LMAOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO

Kled's bio:

WELL HOW DAMN DIDDLY DOO, SKAARL, IT APPEARS AS THOUGH A BEAR IS ON MY LAND!
I'M GONNA GO STICK MY SIZE THREE BOOT RIGHT UP IT'S A S S.
*Kled proceeds to get his face smashed in by an armored bear*
SNARFGLARBLING BEARS, HELP ME SKAARL!
gleegorlorg
OH SKAARL, YOU DUN CRACKED ME UP!
Zilean knew armored bears shouldn't be in league >: ^D
As a Zilean main, I hope Volibear gets deleted. I am appalled that he would even be referenced.
This post is the greatest thing I've seen in weeks.
Can we have volibear beat himself up in his new lore?
